head: The Best 9 Spribe Aviator Strategies
description:
You could make a Spribe aviator prediction, but in the end, it’s all up to your luck. Like any other game of chance, there’s no winning strategy or fundamental tip that can secure you a sure win. Spribe games are all provably fair and are based on RNG algorithms, meaning that all of its results are 100% random. You can’t predict what will happen next, but that’s exactly where the excitement comes from.

With that said, it doesn’t hurt to employ several bankroll managing strategies or other systems that players found helpful. Use the following Spribe aviator game tricks to improve your odds and increase your wins:

head: Minimum Risk Tactics (one bet)
description:
This strategy is great if you’re a beginner casino player or have just begun playing Aviator. It allows you to get comfortable with the game, and you could save more crypto than you lose. However, be aware that it could take you a long time before you can hit a big jackpot. 

Here’s how it works:

You bet small and cashout in each round if the multiplier is between 1.20x and 1.21x.

By doing this, you’re actually building up your balance which will eventually help you make bigger bets and trigger even bigger wins.

Tip: You can enable the auto-cashout and auto-bet options in the settings.

The 1.5X Strategy (one bet)

Like the title of this technique suggests, you have to make a bet and cash out at 1.5X on the multiplier. The aim of this strategy is to make slow profits with a medium to a low-risk factor. It also guarantees a 50% profit when the Aviator makes the 1.5X multiplier.

Double Up Strategy (one bet)

This is a medium-risk strategy and guarantees a 100% profit if the multiplier is won. 

Here’s what you should do:

Always cash out at 2x and bet after a set of 1x or 1.8x multipliers pass.

head: Moderate Risk Tactics (one bet)
description:
This strategy is for players who have a big bankroll and are not afraid to take a risk. 

Here’s how it works:

You bet on 2x and 3x multipliers. There’s a probability of 40-42% that you’ll win, but with a bit of luck, you could even increase your wins.

head: High Risky Tactics (one bet)
description:
If you’re feeling really lucky and are not afraid to take a chance, then this strategy is for you.

Aim for the 100x multiplier, and good luck!

The 2:1 Strategy (two bets)

To win on the aviator game Spribe, you can use the 2:1 strategy. It’s one of the most successful two bet strategies out there, and you can benefit a lot from it if you’re lucky.

Here’s how it works:

Place two bets where the stakes are 2:1. Cash-out when you hit the 1.5x multiplier.

Your bigger bet must cover the small bet, and this will ensure that the smaller bet makes all the profit with very little risk.

The 1.5x + 2x Medium Risk Strategy (two bets)

This system can be very rewarding when your stars are aligned. 

Here’s how it works:

Your biggest bet can’t go higher than 1.5x, and the lowest bet won’t go higher than 2x. You cash out when the plane hits over 10x.
